name: gcal-smart-quick-add
description: Todoist-like natural language input for Google Calendar

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && esbuild src/content.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/content.js --format=iife && cp src/styles.css dist/styles.css
scripts.dev: mkdir -p dist && cp src/styles.css dist/styles.css && esbuild src/content.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/content.js --format=iife --watch
